phrase.noPhrasesYet: No phrases have been registered yet

placeholders.phraseInput: Example: Where have you been recently?

modal.excludeHighPracticeCount: Exclude phrases with high practice count

dailyGoal.title: Daily Goal
dailyGoal.description: Aim to practice reading aloud 10 times a day. Consistent practice is the key to improvement.

practiceCount.title: Practice Count
practiceCount.description: We recommend reading each phrase aloud at least 50 times. Through repetitive practice, phrases will naturally come out of your mouth.

effectiveMethods.title: Effective Practice Methods
effectiveMethods.naturalSpeed: Repeat until you can read at natural speed
effectiveMethods.understanding: Practice while understanding the meaning of phrases
effectiveMethods.pronunciation: Imagine using phrases in real situations

hero.subtitle: A web application that makes language learning fun and effective on your own using speech recognition technology
hero.loginPrompt: To get started, click the login button in the top right

speechRecognition.title: Pronunciation Practice with Speech Recognition
speechRecognition.description: Master accurate pronunciation using the latest speech recognition technology.

quiz.title: Quiz-style Learning
quiz.description: Reinforce memorized phrases through fun quiz formats.

progress.title: Learning Progress Tracking & Management
progress.description: Visualize your learning status and support continuous learning.

subscription.subscriptionRequired: Basic Plan subscription required to use AI phrase generation
subscription.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to AI phrase generation immediately.
